column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This was my first tapas experience
column2: and I enjoyed it. The server was friendly
column3: and we were seated quickly. I know tapas is not about veggies but I would love to have more options... in any case
column4: I was satisfied with the quality of the dishes I was able to try -- endive salad was awesome! -- and I left surprisingly full.
